summary: Website for 8th grade students to access the Honeydew ebook for free online.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Simple student-friendly logo mark with the word “Honeydew” (honeydew-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Warm, minimal hero illustration of a student reading with books and a soft, non-blue/purple palette (honeydew-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a coherent, student-friendly visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) and apply it consistently across all pages and components (avoid a blue/purple primary palette).
Implement a simple landing page for Class 8 students that clearly lists the available free ebook: “Honeydew”, with a prominent action to open/read it.
Add an ebook reading view for “Honeydew” that allows students to read the book in-browser and optionally download it, without requiring login.
Add backend support to serve a minimal catalog of available ebooks (initially only “Honeydew”), including title and a frontend-accessible asset path/URL for the ebook file.

Add the Honeydew ebook file as a static frontend asset and wire it to the ebook catalog entry (use a clearly named PDF file path under frontend/public). If the actual PDF cannot be provided at build time, include a placeholder PDF and a single documented place to swap in the real file without code changes.
Generate and include basic static brand assets for the site (logo and a simple hero illustration) and render them in the UI as static assets (do not serve images through the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple website where class 8 students can access and read the Honeydew ebook for free online.

projectName: Class 8 website to access the Honeydew ebook for free
